document.full_text: germany will shut down all seven of its nuclear power plants that began operation before 1980 and it is unclear whether they will start up again, the government said on tuesday.
document.title: germany to shut down pre-1980 nuclear plants
lines_and_colors: germany will shut down all seven of its nuclear power plants that began operation before 1980 and it is unclear whether they will start up again, the government said on tuesday.
